/* kr.co.dbvision.api.pub.wks.pubwks013.service.mapper.Pubwks013Mapper.selectPubwks013List */ SELECT A.BSRP_NO, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MHS_BSRP_EXCCLC WHERE BSRP_NO = B.BSRP_NO AND ELCTSCT_SE_SN = B.ELCTSCT_SE_SN AND
EXCCLC_SN > B.EXCCLC_SN ) AS COPY_FLAG, A.ELCTSCT_SE_SN, (SELECT BPLC_KOR_NM FROM STM_BIZPLC WHERE BPLC_CODE=A.BPLC_CODE) AS BPLC_CODE_NM, FNC_DATESTR(A.REQST_DE) AS REQST_DE, A.BSRP_NM, A.BSRP_PURPS, A.BSRP_SE_CODE, FNC_COMCODENM ('C024',A.BSRP_SE_CODE) AS BSRP_SE_NM, A.REQST_EMPNO, FNC_GETKORNM(A.REQST_EMPNO) AS REQST_EMP_NM, FNC_DATESTR(A.BSRP_SDT) AS BSRP_SDT, FNC_DATESTR(A.BSRP_EDT) AS BSRP_EDT, A.BSRP_SHR, A.BSRP_EHR, A.STAYNG, A.STAYNG || '박' || A.STAYNG_DAYCNT || '일' AS STAYNG_DAYCNT, A.TRNSPORT_SE_CODE, FNC_COMCODENM ('C059',A.TRNSPORT_SE_CODE) AS TRNSPORT_SE_CODE_NM, A.BUGT_CODE, A.ELCTSCT_DOC_NO, A.ELCTSCT_STTUS_CODE, FNC_COMCODENM ('EA004',A.ELCTSCT_STTUS_CODE) AS ELCTSCT_STTUS_CODE_NM, A.ELCTSCT_EMPNO, B.EXCCLC_ELCTSCT_DOC_NO, FNC_COMCODENM ('EA004',B.EXCCLC_ELCTSCT_STTUS_CODE) AS EXCCLC_ELCTSCT_STTUS_CODE_NM, B.EXCCLC_ELCTSCT_STTUS_CODE, B.EXCCLC_ELCTSCT_EMPNO, B.EXCCLC_SN, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.UPT_DT, A.UPT_ID, A.BSRP_CITY, (SELECT USER_NM FROM STM_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM STM_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.UPT_ID) AS UPT_NM, (SELECT COUNT(BSRP_EMPNO) FROM MHS_BSRP_DETAIL WHERE BSRP_NO = A.BSRP_NO AND ELCTSCT_SE_SN = A.ELCTSCT_SE_SN) AS BSRP_EMP_CNT, (SELECT FNC_GETKORNM(BSRP_EMPNO) FROM MHS_BSRP_DETAIL WHERE BSRP_NO = A.BSRP_NO AND ROWNUM = '1' AND ELCTSCT_SE_SN = A.ELCTSCT_SE_SN) AS BSRP_EMPNM FROM MHS_BSRP A , MHS_BSRP_EXCCLC B WHERE A.BSRP_NO = B.BSRP_NO(+) AND A.ELCTSCT_SE_SN = (SELECT MAX(ELCTSCT_SE_SN) FROM MHS_BSRP WHERE BSRP_NO = A.BSRP_NO) AND A.ELCTSCT_STTUS_CODE IS NOT NULL
AND A.BSRP_NO IN (SELECT A.BSRP_NO FROM MHS_BSRP_DETAIL A , MHS_EMP B WHERE A.BSRP_EMPNO = B.EMPNO(+) AND B.DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode} AND (A.BSRP_EMPNO = #{reqstEmpno} OR A.REG_ID = #{reqstEmpno}))
AND A.BSRP_NO IN (SELECT A.BSRP_NO FROM MHS_BSRP_DETAIL A WHERE (A.BSRP_EMPNO IN (SELECT EMPNO FROM MHS_EMP WHERE DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode}) OR A.REG_ID IN (SELECT EMPNO FROM MHS_EMP WHERE DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode})))
AND A.BSRP_NO IN (SELECT A.BSRP_NO FROM MHS_BSRP_DETAIL A , MHS_EMP B WHERE A.BSRP_EMPNO = B.EMPNO(+) AND (A.BSRP_EMPNO = #{reqstEmpno} OR A.REG_ID = #{reqstEmpno}))
AND B.EXCCLC_ELCTSCT_STTUS_CODE = #{excclcElctsctSttusCode}
AND A.BSRP_SDT >= TO_DATE(#{sRegDt} || '000000','YYYY-MM-DDHH24MISS')
AND A.BSRP_EDT <= TO_DATE(#{eRegDt} || '235959','YYYY-MM-DDHH24MISS')
AND A.REQST_DE = #{reqstDe}
AND A.BSRP_NM LIKE '%' || #{bsrpNm} || '%'
ORDER BY A.BSRP_NO DESC , B.EXCCLC_SN ASC

/* kr.co.dbvision.api.pub.wks.pubwks013.service.mapper.Pubwks013Mapper.selectPubwks013 */ SELECT A.BSRP_NO, A.BPLC_CODE, FNC_DATESTR(A.REQST_DE) AS REQST_DE, FNC_GETKORNM(A.REQST_EMPNO) AS REQST_EMP_NM, A.BSRP_NM, A.BSRP_PURPS, A.BSRP_SE_CODE, A.TRNSPORT_SE_CODE, FNC_COMCODENM ('C024',A.BSRP_SE_CODE) AS BSRP_SE_NM, FNC_COMCODENM ('C059',A.TRNSPORT_SE_CODE) AS TRNSPORT_SE_CODE_NM, A.REQST_EMPNO, FNC_DATESTR(A.BSRP_SDT) AS BSRP_SDT, FNC_DATESTR(A.BSRP_EDT) AS BSRP_EDT, SUBSTR(A.BSRP_SHR,1,2) || ':' || SUBSTR(A.BSRP_SHR,3,2) AS BSRP_SHR, SUBSTR(A.BSRP_EHR,1,2) || ':' || SUBSTR(A.BSRP_EHR,3,2) AS BSRP_EHR, A.STAYNG, A.STAYNG_DAYCNT, A.BUGT_CODE, A.ELCTSCT_DOC_NO, FNC_COMCODENM ('EA004',A.ELCTSCT_STTUS_CODE) AS ELCTSCT_STTUS_CODE_NM, A.ELCTSCT_STTUS_CODE, A.ELCTSCT_EMPNO, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.UPT_DT, A.UPT_ID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM STM_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM STM_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.UPT_ID) AS UPT_NM, A.BSRP_CITY, A.ATCHMNFL_NO FROM MHS_BSRP A WHERE A.BSRP_NO = #{bsrpNo} AND A.ELCTSCT_SE_SN = #{elctsctSeSn}

/* kr.co.dbvision.api.pub.wks.pubwks013.service.mapper.Pubwks013Mapper.selectPubwks013DtlList */ SELECT A.BSRP_NO, A.BSRP_EMPNO, A.VISIT_OFFIC_NM, A.VISIT_CN, A.DAY_AMT, A.CGFFD_AMT, A.STAYNG_AMT, A.TRNSPORT_AMT, A.LOCAL_TRNSPORT_AMT, A.DTY_VRSC_EMPNO, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.UPT_DT, A.UPT_ID, B.KOR_NM, B.CLSF_CODE, FNC_GETDEPTNM(B.DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_NM, FNC_GETCLSFNM(B.CLSF_CODE) AS CLSF_CODE_NM FROM MHS_BSRP_DETAIL A , MHS_EMP B WHERE A.BSRP_EMPNO = B.EMPNO(+) AND A.BSRP_NO = #{bsrpNo} AND A.ELCTSCT_SE_SN = #{elctsctSeSn}

/* kr.co.dbvision.api.pub.wks.pubwks013.service.mapper.Pubwks013Mapper.selectPubwks013Dtl2List */ SELECT A.BSRP_EMPL_NO, A.ELCTSCT_SE_SN, FNC_GETKORNM(A.BSRP_EMPL_NO) AS BSRP_EMPNM, A.BSRP_EXCCLC_SN, FNC_DATESTR(A.BSRP_DE) AS BSRP_DE, A.TRNSPORT_CODE, A.START_CITY, A.PURPS_CITY, A.EXCCLC_STAYNG_AMT, A.DAY_AMT, A.CGFFD_AMT, A.STAYNG_AMT, A.TRNSPORT_AMT, A.LOCAL_TRNSPORT_AMT, A.VISIT_CN, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.UPT_DT, A.UPT_ID, A.EXCCLC_SN, (SELECT USER_NM FROM STM_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM STM_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.UPT_ID) AS UPT_NM FROM MHS_BSRP_EXCCLC_DETAIL A WHERE A.BSRP_NO = #{bsrpNo} AND A.ELCTSCT_SE_SN = #{elctsctSeSn} AND A.EXCCLC_SN = #{excclcSn}
mapper.update: /* kr.co.dbvision.api.pub.wks.pubwks013.service.mapper.Pubwks013Mapper.updateBsrpAtchflNoPubwks013 */ UPDATE MHS_BSRP SET ATCHMNFL_NO = #{atchmnflNo}, UPT_ID = #{uptId}, UPT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE BSRP_NO = #{bsrpNo} AND ELCTSCT_SE_SN = #{elctsctSeSn}

/* kr.co.dbvision.api.pub.wks.pubwks013.service.mapper.Pubwks013Mapper.saveExcclcPubwks013 */ UPDATE MHS_BSRP_EXCCLC_DETAIL SET BSRP_DE = REPLACE(#{bsrpDe},'-',''), TRNSPORT_CODE = #{trnsportCode}, START_CITY = #{startCity}, PURPS_CITY = #{purpsCity}, EXCCLC_STAYNG_AMT = #{excclcStayngAmt}, DAY_AMT = #{dayAmt}, CGFFD_AMT = #{cgffdAmt}, STAYNG_AMT = #{stayngAmt}, TRNSPORT_AMT = #{trnsportAmt}, LOCAL_TRNSPORT_AMT = #{localTrnsportAmt}, VISIT_CN = #{visitCn}, UPT_DT = SYSDATE, UPT_ID = #{uptId} WHERE BSRP_EMPL_NO = #{bsrpEmplNo} AND ELCTSCT_SE_SN = #{elctsctSeSn} AND EXCCLC_SN = #{excclcSn} AND BSRP_EXCCLC_SN = #{bsrpExcclcSn}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MHS_BSRP_EXCCLC ( BSRP_NO, ELCTSCT_SE_SN, EXCCLC_SN, EXCCLC_ELCTSCT_DOC_NO, EXCCLC_ELCTSCT_STTUS_CODE, EXCCLC_ELCTSCT_EMPNO, EXCCLC_DE, REG_DT, REG_ID ) SELECT BSRP_NO, ELCTSCT_SE_SN, (SELECT MAX(EXCCLC_SN) + 1 FROM MHS_BSRP_EXCCLC WHERE BSRP_NO = #{bsrpNo} AND ELCTSCT_SE_SN = #{elctsctSeSn}), '', '', '', '', SYSDATE, #{regId} FROM MHS_BSRP_EXCCLC WHERE BSRP_NO = #{bsrpNo} AND ELCTSCT_SE_SN = #{elctsctSeSn} AND EXCCLC_SN = #{excclcSn} AND EXCCLC_ELCTSCT_STTUS_CODE = '20'

INSERT INTO MHS_BSRP_EXCCLC_DETAIL ( BSRP_NO, ELCTSCT_SE_SN, EXCCLC_SN, BSRP_EMPL_NO, BSRP_EXCCLC_SN, BSRP_DE, TRNSPORT_CODE, START_CITY, PURPS_CITY, EXCCLC_STAYNG_AMT, DAY_AMT, CGFFD_AMT, STAYNG_AMT, TRNSPORT_AMT, LOCAL_TRNSPORT_AMT, VISIT_CN, REG_DT, REG_ID ) SELECT BSRP_NO, ELCTSCT_SE_SN, (SELECT MAX(EXCCLC_SN) + 1 FROM MHS_BSRP_EXCCLC_DETAIL WHERE BSRP_NO = #{bsrpNo} AND ELCTSCT_SE_SN = #{elctsctSeSn} AND EXCCLC_SN = #{excclcSn} ), BSRP_EMPL_NO, BSRP_EXCCLC_SN, BSRP_DE, TRNSPORT_CODE, START_CITY, PURPS_CITY, EXCCLC_STAYNG_AMT, DAY_AMT, CGFFD_AMT, STAYNG_AMT, TRNSPORT_AMT, LOCAL_TRNSPORT_AMT, VISIT_CN, SYSDATE, #{regId} FROM MHS_BSRP_EXCCLC_DETAIL WHERE BSRP_NO = #{bsrpNo} AND ELCTSCT_SE_SN = #{elctsctSeSn} AND EXCCLC_SN = #{excclcSn}
mapper.update: UPDATE MHS_BSRP SET EXCCLC_SN = TO_NUMBER(#{excclcSn}) + 1 WHERE BSRP_NO = #{bsrpNo} AND ELCTSCT_SE_SN = #{elctsctSeSn} AND EXCCLC_SN = #{excclcSn}
